about_me: I am a frontend developer passionate about creating attractive and functional interfaces.

netflix.description: Application that shows movies using the TMDB API.

poke.description: Web app to explore and search Pokémon using PokéAPI.
poke.moreInfo: This application displays a list of Pokémon obtained from the PokéAPI. You can search, filter, and view detailed statistics for each one. It was built with React, Tailwind, and React Router.

portfolio.description: Personal portfolio created with React and Tailwind CSS.
